mapper.select: SELECT WARE_NO AS CODE_ID , WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{startStrHopDt}, 1,6) AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CODE_ID ASC

SELECT WARE_NO , WARE_NM FROM ( SELECT WARE_NO , (CASE WHEN INSTR(WARE_NM,'서비스센터') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(WARE_NM,0,INSTR(WARE_NM,'서비스센터')-1) WHEN INSTR(WARE_NM,'영업센터') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(WARE_NM,0,INSTR(WARE_NM,'영업센터')-1) WHEN INSTR(WARE_NM,'창고') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(WARE_NM,0,INSTR(WARE_NM,'창고')-1) ELSE WARE_NM END ) AS WARE_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN ('20','30') AND O1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{startStrHopDt},1,6) AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O1.CLO_DT IS NULL AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02','W03','W06') UNION ALL ( SELECT WARE_NO , WARE_NM FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND WARE_NO = '100002' AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{startStrHopDt},1,6) ) ) WHERE 1=1 AND WARE_NM IS NOT NULL AND WARE_NO LIKE #{wareDvCd} || '%' ORDER BY WARE_NM ASC , WARE_NO ASC

WITH PART_INF AS ( /* 품목정보 */ SELECT P1.PD_CD , P2.SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ , P2.PD_NM /*품목명*/ , ( CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(P1.PD_PRP_VAL01,2,1) ELSE P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 END ) AS AS_MAT_ITM_GRP_CD /*PD_GRP_CD AS자재 품목그룹*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 || P1.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS KIWI_PD_CD FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P1 /*상품각사속성상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' /*상품유형코드 : C 복합상품, P 기준상품, S 서비스, M 교재제품, Y 융합상품*/ AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKndCd}
) , WARE_IF AS ( /*서비스 센터 및 창고 */ SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O1.OG_ID , O1.OG_TP_CD , O1.OG_CD , O1.OG_NM , O1.HGR_OG_ID , S1.WARE_NO , S1.WARE_NM , S1.WARE_USE_YN , S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD , S1.HGR_WARE_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' */ /* AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' */ /*미사용창고에서 반품 되는 경우도 있기 때문에*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{startStrHopDt},1,6) AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O1.CLO_DT IS NULL
AND S1.WARE_NO = '100002' /* 고정 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') /* 엔지니어 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02')
ORDER BY O1.BASE_YM, O1.OG_CD ) , BASE_GROUP AS ( SELECT P1.PD_CD , P1.SAP_MAT_CD , P1.PD_NM , P1.AS_MAT_ITM_GRP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_ANGLE_CD', S2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL, 'ko') || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_FLOR_NO_CD', S2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL, 'ko') || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_COF_CD', S2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL, 'ko') || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WARE_TP_CD', S2.WARE_TP_CD, 'ko') AS ITM_LCT_NM , S1.STR_OJ_WARE_NO , S4.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY
, SUM(OSTR_AK_QTY) AS OSTR_AK_QTY /* ST156_REQ_QTY */
, SUM(OSTR_AGG_QTY) AS OSTR_AK_QTY /* ST156_ACC_QTY */
FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ S1 /*품목출고요청내역, ST156TB*/ INNER JOIN PART_INF P1 ON S1.ITM_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN WARE_IF W1 ON S1.STR_OJ_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_LCT_IZ S2 /*고객서비스품목위치내역, ST110TB*/ ON S1.OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO = S2.WARE_NO AND S1.ITM_PD_CD = S2.ITM_PD_CD AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ S4 /*월별품목재고내역, ST121TB*/ ON S1.OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO = S4.WARE_NO AND S1.ITM_PD_CD = S4.ITM_PD_CD AND S4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.STR_HOP_DT BETWEEN #{startStrHopDt} AND #{endStrHopDt} AND S1.OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO = '100002' /*고정*/
AND RECT_OSTR_DT IS NULL
AND RECT_OSTR_DT IS NOT NULL
AND OSTR_AK_TP_CD = #{ostrAkTpCd}
GROUP BY P1.PD_CD , P1.SAP_MAT_CD , P1.PD_NM , P1.AS_MAT_ITM_GRP_CD , S1.STR_OJ_WARE_NO , S2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL , S2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL , S2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL , S2.WARE_TP_CD , S4.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY ) SELECT PD_CD , PD_NM , SAP_MAT_CD , ITM_LCT_NM , PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , ${wareNoFieldsSumStr} AS OSTR_AK_SUM , ${wareNoFields} FROM BASE_GROUP PIVOT ( SUM(OSTR_AK_QTY) FOR STR_OJ_WARE_NO IN (${wareNoInStr}) ) ORDER BY AS_MAT_ITM_GRP_CD ASC , PD_CD ASC
